Articles.Content: Hello Everybody! Nice to meet you! ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

Hello Carter\_Jimmy, and welcome to the forums!

Nice to meet you. I hope you find this place friendly and inviting.

Happy landings!
